valueProposition.title: Audit Accuracy Meets Actionable Analytics
valueProposition.body: Most providers stop at catching billing errors. Orca goes further: we integrate with your finance and logistics workflows to deliver 100% pre‑payment accuracy checks, automated dispute resolution, and custom dashboards that surface carrier performance, accessorial leakage, and true landed costs.
